name: Blood Transfusion Association
goal: The Blood Transfusion Association is an international non-profit trade association founded with the objective to address the unique needs of the blood bag systems industry and will work together to ensure sufficient and safe supply of blood and blood components for transfusion to the patients in need. Through its direct membership and stakeholder network, BTA aims to make the voice of the blood sector heard in a collaborative approach.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Environment, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade
euInitiatives:
Regulation on Medical Devices, Blood legislation, Chemicals legislation, Registration, evaluation, authorisation and restriction of chemicals (REACH).
BTA received its royal decree in September 2019. Therefore, its activities are still in an initial phase and may be expanded as relevant.
